trans-unit.source: Public preview release of Azure Backup FAQ | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Public preview release of Azure Backup FAQ | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: This version of the FAQ supports the Public Preview release of the Azure Backup service.
trans-unit.target: This version of the FAQ supports the Public Preview release of the Azure Backup service.

trans-unit.source: Answers to frequently asked questions about the backup agent, backup and retention, recovery, security and other common questions about the Azure Backup solution.
trans-unit.target: Answers to frequently asked questions about the backup agent, backup and retention, recovery, security and other common questions about the Azure Backup solution.

trans-unit.source: Public Preview release of Azure Backup service- FAQ
trans-unit.target: Public Preview release of Azure Backup service- FAQ

trans-unit.target: [AZURE.SELECTOR]

trans-unit.source: Backup FAQ for Classic mode
trans-unit.target: Backup FAQ for Classic mode

trans-unit.source: Backup FAQ for ARM mode
trans-unit.target: Backup FAQ for ARM mode

trans-unit.source: This article provides information specific to the Azure Backup service Public Preview release.
trans-unit.target: This article provides information specific to the Azure Backup service Public Preview release.

trans-unit.source: This article is updated when new frequently-asked questions arrive, and it supplements the [Azure Backup FAQ](backup-azure-backup-faq).
trans-unit.target: This article is updated when new frequently-asked questions arrive, and it supplements the [Azure Backup FAQ](backup-azure-backup-faq).

trans-unit.source: The Azure Backup FAQ provides the full set of questions and answers about the Azure Backup service.
trans-unit.target: The Azure Backup FAQ provides the full set of questions and answers about the Azure Backup service.

trans-unit.source: You can ask questions about Azure Backup in the Disqus section of this article or a related article.
trans-unit.target: You can ask questions about Azure Backup in the Disqus section of this article or a related article.

trans-unit.source: You can also post questions about the Azure Backup service in the [discussion forum](https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/forums/azure/home?forum=windowsazureonlinebackup).
trans-unit.target: You can also post questions about the Azure Backup service in the [discussion forum](https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/forums/azure/home?forum=windowsazureonlinebackup).

trans-unit.source: What's in the Public Preview release?
trans-unit.target: What's in the Public Preview release?

trans-unit.source: The Public Preview release introduces the Recovery Services vault and ARM support when protecting Azure VMs.
trans-unit.target: The Public Preview release introduces the Recovery Services vault and ARM support when protecting Azure VMs.

trans-unit.source: The Recovery Services vault is the next generation of vaults.
trans-unit.target: The Recovery Services vault is the next generation of vaults.

trans-unit.source: It is the vault used by the Azure Backup and the Azure Site Recovery(ASR) services.
trans-unit.target: It is the vault used by the Azure Backup and the Azure Site Recovery(ASR) services.

trans-unit.source: Think of it as the v.2 vault.
trans-unit.target: Think of it as the v.2 vault.

trans-unit.source: Recovery Services and Backup vaults
trans-unit.target: Recovery Services and Backup vaults

trans-unit.source: Recovery Services vaults are v.2, are Backup vaults (v.1) still supported?
trans-unit.target: Recovery Services vaults are v.2, are Backup vaults (v.1) still supported?

trans-unit.source: Yes, Backup vaults are still supported.
trans-unit.target: Yes, Backup vaults are still supported.

trans-unit.source: Create Backup vaults in the Classic portal.
trans-unit.target: Create Backup vaults in the Classic portal.

trans-unit.source: Create Recovery Services vaults in the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: Create Recovery Services vaults in the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: Can I migrate a Backup vault to a Recovery Services vault?
trans-unit.target: Can I migrate a Backup vault to a Recovery Services vault?

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately no, at this time you can't migrate the contents of a Backup vault to a Recovery Services vault.
trans-unit.target: Unfortunately no, at this time you can't migrate the contents of a Backup vault to a Recovery Services vault.

trans-unit.source: We are working on adding this functionality, but it is not available as part of Public Preview.
trans-unit.target: We are working on adding this functionality, but it is not available as part of Public Preview.

trans-unit.source: Do Recovery Services vaults support v.1 or v.2 VMs?
trans-unit.target: Do Recovery Services vaults support v.1 or v.2 VMs?

trans-unit.source: Recovery Services vaults support v.1 and v.2 VMs.
trans-unit.target: Recovery Services vaults support v.1 and v.2 VMs.

trans-unit.source: You can back up a VM created in the Classic portal (which is V.1), or a VM created in the Azure portal (which is V.2) to a Recovery Services vault.
trans-unit.target: You can back up a VM created in the Classic portal (which is V.1), or a VM created in the Azure portal (which is V.2) to a Recovery Services vault.

trans-unit.source: ARM support for Azure VMs
trans-unit.target: ARM support for Azure VMs

trans-unit.source: Are there any limitations with ARM support for Azure VMs?
trans-unit.target: Are there any limitations with ARM support for Azure VMs?

trans-unit.source: The PowerShell cmdlets for ARM are currently not available.
trans-unit.target: The PowerShell cmdlets for ARM are currently not available.

trans-unit.source: You must use the Azure portal UI to add resources to a resource group.
trans-unit.target: You must use the Azure portal UI to add resources to a resource group.
